kpi.name: M1022C133

kpi_info.title: DCH DOWNLINK RECONFIG FAIL DUE TO TRANSPORT FOR INTERACTIVE
kpi_info.use: The number of DCH reconfiguration failures for interactive NRT RB due to transport resources in SRNC in DL. UPDATED: When the DCH reconfiguration for interactive NRT RB in the uplink direction fails due to transport resources.

kpi.kpi_alias: DCH DOWNLINK RECONFIG FAIL DUE TO TRANSPORT FOR INTERACTIVE
